trans-unit.source: Can be optionally applied to a workflow assembly.
It defines a mapping between a common language runtime namespace that is defined in the current assembly and an XML namespace.

This information is used in extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization/deserialization when activities or workflows that are defined in the assembly decorated with this attribute are used.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute"></xref> class, initializing <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace"></xref> properties.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the value for <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the value for <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace"></xref>.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Type.Assembly"></xref> name of the decorated class.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Type.Assembly"></xref> name of the decorated class.
Gets a <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the name of the CLR namespace of the decorated class.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the name of the CLR namespace of the decorated class.
Gets a <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the name of the XML namespace of the decorated class.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the name of the XML namespace of the decorated class.
